name: Canvas
signal_source: App Store reviews highlight need for platforms with 'no shadowbans, no hidden algorithms, no bias. Just pure, authentic expression' over manipulative social media
description: Pure creative expression platform focused on authentic sharing without algorithmic manipulation or engagement metrics
target_user: Digital artists and creators frustrated with algorithm-driven platforms that hide or manipulate their creative content
pain_point_evidence: Users seek platforms that 'treat all users equally' and provide 'fairness, transparency, and freedom' in creative expression
differentiation: Zero algorithmic manipulation vs. engagement-driven feeds, focuses on authentic expression over viral content
subscription_fit: Premium features include advanced creation tools, analytics dashboard, and priority creator support

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic sharing, premium for advanced creation tools and analytics
